long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QRT is a Chrome extension designed to streamline and enhance your social media experience. With just a few clicks, you can automate repetitive tasks, engage with specific communities, and share dynamic content effortlessly.

Key Features:

Quick Comment Insertion: Fetch and insert random comments with a single click.
Cashtag Support: Automatically generate and paste relevant cashtags.
Image Sharing: Copy and paste random images to elevate your posts.
Customizable Categories: Choose content categories to suit your audience.
Phantom Wallet Integration: Log in with your Phantom Wallet to collect points and compete on the leaderboard.
Why Choose QRT?
Save time, automate tasks, and boost your online engagement. Perfect for social media managers, influencers, and anyone looking to enhance their presence effortlessly.
